pullrequest.title: Models changed for updated DRC task specifications

content.raw: I tweaked the inertia in 1e6c6ff. This and many other DRC models could probably stand to get a moment of inertia re-calculation, but it's hard to figure out exactly what figures the original authors of the models were working with (it looks like many of them are interns or random other people). If the inertia of this model poses a problem in the future, I'll go back and calculate it more precisely. (It's actually not being used in the challenges right now, but someone may want to use it for a custom world.)
